name: The Dark Magicians
desc:
"Dark Magician" or "Dark Magician Girl" + 1 Spellcaster monster
Once per turn, if a Spell/Trap Card or effect is activated (except during the Damage Step): You can draw 1 card, and if you drew a Spell/Trap, you can Set it, and if it is a Quick-Play Spell or Trap, it can be activated this turn. If this card is destroyed: You can Special Summon 1 "Dark Magician" and 1 "Dark Magician Girl" from your hand, Deck, and/or GY.
